class events.tests.tests_views.BaseEventsViewsTestCase(methodName='runTest')#

Bases: borgia.tests.tests_views.BaseBorgiaViewsTestCase

Base for Events views tests. Users : user1 (all permissions), user2 (no permissions), user3 (manager of event1). Event :

  • event1, managed by user3.

  • event2, managed by user3, done
